# Repository description

This is the location for all R code and data needed to recreate analyses presented in:   
Clink, D. J., Zafar, M., Ahmad, A.H. & Lau, A.R. (in review). Limited evidence for individual signatures or site-level patterns of variation in male Northern gray gibbon (Hylobates funereus) duet codas.
